name: LANdesk
description: LANdesk is a self-hosted, local-first dashboard for managing personal productivity. It provides a clean interface to organize tasks, notes, and files, all running on your own machine or local network.

name: MoveGreen
description: MoveGreen is a comprehensive mobile application designed to promote sustainable mobility. It empowers users to track their environmentally friendly activities, such as walking, biking, and using public transport, while visualizing their positive impact through COâ‚‚ savings and a rewarding points system. </br></br>With this app, I participated in the Fabrizio Rocca Award 2025 and won 1st prize.

name: Grademate
description: GradeMate is a React Native mobile application designed to help students track their school grades. It provides an easy and secure way to save grades locally on your device and automatically calculates averages based on the specific weighting rules used by the Galileo Galilei school.

name: Portfolio Website
description: My personal portfolio website to showcase my projects, skills, and experience.
